_schema_documentation._comment: Configuration schema for FinanceQA AI Agent
_schema_documentation.providers: Model provider configurations with type, model_name, base_url, etc.
_schema_documentation.default_provider: Default provider name to use for agent operations
_schema_documentation.evaluation: Specific provider settings for evaluation runs

rag.collection_name: Name of ChromaDB collection for financial patterns
rag.config_path: Path to context patterns YAML configuration

confidence_thresholds.rag_min_confidence: Minimum confidence (0.0-1.0) to use RAG results
confidence_thresholds.high_confidence: High confidence threshold (0.0-1.0) for strong RAG signals

retrieval_settings.max_results: Maximum number of results to retrieve from RAG
retrieval_settings.similarity_threshold: Minimum similarity score for relevant results
